mapper.insert:
SELECT gen_random_uuid()
insert into employees (id, employee_code, full_name, email, phone_number, department_id, job_title, status, avatar_url, created_at, updated_at) values (#{id,jdbcType=OTHER}, #{employeeCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fullName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phoneNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{departmentId,jdbcType=OTHER}, #{jobTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{avatarUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update employees set employee_code = #{employeeCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, full_name = #{fullName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone_number = #{phoneNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, department_id = #{departmentId,jdbcType=OTHER}, job_title = #{jobTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, avatar_url = #{avatarUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, created_at = #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updated_at = #{updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=OTHER}
mapper.select: select 'false' as QUERYID,id, employee_code, full_name, email, phone_number, department_id, job_title, status, avatar_url, created_at, updated_at from employees where id = #{id,jdbcType=OTHER}
select id, employee_code, full_name, email, phone_number, department_id, job_title, status, avatar_url, created_at, updated_at from employees
